src:
Endapan Gas Puluhan Tahun dalam Septic Tank Memakan Korban
06 Nov 2019, 06:51 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Septic tank di rumah warga di Cakung, Jakarta Timur meledak. Insiden ini memakan korban jiwa seorang pria yang bertugas menyedot WC sekaligus sopir dari tangki mobil penyedot WC itu.
Seperti dirangkum detikcom, peristiwa itu terjadi di rumah Agus di RT 16/03 Kelurahan Jatinegara, Cakung, Jakarta Timur, pada Senin (4/11). Saat itu pemilik rumah memanggil korban untuk menyedot WC di rumahnya.
"Kecelakaan kerja itu sebenarnya, pelakunya dia, korbannya dia (juga)," ujar Tomi saat dihubungi detikcom, Selasa (5/11/2019).
Setelah penyedotan selesai, korban mengambil koran lalu membakarnya untuk meyakinkan bahwa proses telah selesai. Koran yang dibakar saat itu padam dan pemilik rumah pun yakin proses telah selesai.
Tidak lama setelah itu, korban mengambil uang dan hendak pamit pulang ke pemilik rumah. Namun tak diduga, tiba-tiba, septic tank meledak dan mengeluarkan suara cukup besar.
Akibat kejadian itu, korban pun terjatuh ke dalam septic tank. Korban pun dinyatakan meninggal dunia.
"Meninggal dunia dengan kondisi luka biasa, nggak terbakar," tandas Romi.
text:
Decades of Gas Sediment in Septic Tanks Eat Victims
Nov 6 2019, 06:51 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - A septic tank in a resident's home in Cakung, East Jakarta exploded. This incident took the life of a man who was in charge of siphoning the toilet as well as the driver of the toilet suction tank.
As summarized by AFP, the incident occurred at Agus's house in RT 16/03 of Jatinegara Urban Village, Cakung, East Jakarta, on Monday (4/11). At that time the owner of the house called the victim to suck the toilet in her house.
"The work accident was actually, the culprit he was, the victim he (also)," said Tomi when contacted by AFP on Tuesday (11/05/2019).
After the suctioning is complete, the victim takes the newspaper and burns it to make sure that the process is complete. Newspapers that were burned at the time were extinguished and the homeowner was convinced the process was complete.
Not long after that, the victim took the money and wanted to say goodbye to the homeowner. But unexpectedly, suddenly, the septic tank exploded and made a big noise.
As a result of the incident, the victim fell into the septic tank. The victim was declared dead.
"Died with an ordinary wound, not burned," said Romi.
